title: The Supreme Court’s biggest rulings before summer recess
text:
The Supreme Court made headlines Monday when it reinstated part of President Trump’s travel ban and agreed to try a case of a baker who refused to make a gay wedding cake — causing several other big decisions to go under the radar.

Here are the other important rulings the justices made before throwing off their robes for the summer recess:
summary:
